code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const location=useLocation();const navItems=[{name:'Home',path:'/',icon:'🏠'},{name:'Auctions',path:'/auctions',icon:'🔨'},{name:'Product Feed',path:'/feed',icon:'📱'},{name:'Local Deals',path:'/local-deals',icon:'🏪'},{name:'Trending',path:'/trending',icon:'🔥'},{name:'Scanner',path:'/scanner',icon:'🤖'},{name:'Profile',path:'/profile',icon:'👤'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"main-navigation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-brand",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",style:{textDecoration:'none',color:'inherit'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Final10"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-items",children:navItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:item.path,className:"nav-item ".concat(location.pathname===item.path?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-icon",children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-label",children:item.name})]},item.path))})]});};export default Navigation;
